summary: Better than figma for sure after initial inspectation and usage

description: It's been 2 years running linux, and I can't count the number of times I wanted to quit because I missed Fima, now I found something way better that Figma, with OFFLINE support
summary: Objectively better than Figma and XD

description:
The recent update has fixed many of the issues with Lunacy, but I don't know why I cannot navigate other sections of my hard drive. I'm not sure if it's a Fedora issue, but I can only access the Documents, Downloads & Recents folders. I'm still having trouble with Lunacy remembering my Google login details, so I mainly use it offline.

Please fix some of these issues in the future. This app is incredible! I enjoy using it more than Figma. A feature request I'd make is improving control with the Pen tool. Currently, the Pen tool doesn't have as much flexibility with anchor points. You can't manipulate the direction points using shift or alt keys. It requires making edits after, and it's a bit limiting.

This app seems very good and feature rich. Unfortunately, at least on my computer with a SATA SSD, it shows an empty window and then it takes around 40 seconds to load the interface every time I open it. Other than that, this is an excelent replacement to Figma and the tutorial explains everything you need to know before using it.
summary: Very good app but takes a long time to load

description: Such a hidden gem of an application. I don't miss affinity designer as much as before and just been using this for most work. Love the many improvements in latest version they have been making.

BUGS ! :
  Play button doesn't works 

Feature :
 Pinch to zoom would have been better.
summary: Nice application ! But these are things which i noticed as BUGS !

description: Looks like the issue is idosyncratic to Flatpak. Running the same bin file from the AUR works just fine.
summary: Glitches when zooming in and out

description: A real alternative to figma, highly recommended.
Very nice tutorial in the begining of the program

Con la versión Flatpak, aunque no la oficial, me siento muy potente trabajando con Lunacy, que era mi programa de diseño favorito desde las versiones beta en Windows. Ahora en linux no necesito nada más que flatpak para instalar Lunacy ya que la versión en Snap "oficial" ni siquiera se ejecuta!

На fedora может тормозить. 
Для того чтобы исправить нужно в настройках флетпака поставить wayland
